responsibilities: Build low-code/no-code GenAI Platform tools using ServiceNow Platform capabilities and frameworks
Build high-quality, clean, scalable, and reusable code by enforcing best practices around software engineering architecture and processes (Code Reviews, Unit testing, etc.)
Balance business objectives, user experience, and long-term technical scalability to make effective trade-offs
Work with product owners to understand detailed requirements and own your code from design, implementation, test automation, and delivery of high-quality products to users
Design software that is simple to use to allow customers to extend and customize the functionality to meet their specific needs
Contribute to the design and implementation of new products and features while also enhancing the existing product suite
Be a mentor and coach for other engineers and help promote knowledge-sharing
skills: Proficiency in Java or a similar object-oriented language
Passion for JavaScript and the Web as a platform, reusability, and componentization
Experience with data structures, algorithms, object-oriented design, design patterns, and performance/scale considerations
Experience with modern UI frameworks like Angular, React, or Vue
Ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders across teams
Ability to manage projects with material technical risk at a team level
analysis:
The job responsibilities include building low-code/no-code GenAI Platform tools using ServiceNow Platform capabilities and frameworks. The explicit mention of "GenAI Platform tools" indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI. The other responsibilities focus on software engineering best practices, user experience, and product development, which are common in many software development roles. However, the specific mention of GenAI tools is a clear indicator of involvement with Generative AI.

The skills required for the job include proficiency in programming languages, experience with modern UI frameworks, and analytical and design skills. While these skills are essential for software development, they do not specifically point to working with Generative AI or language models. However, the responsibilities section already provides the necessary context to determine the involvement with GenAI.

Overall, the job involves working with Generative AI, as indicated by the responsibility to build GenAI Platform tools.
